message_1: A group of 20 students received marks in their math test. The teacher wants to check whether the median marks are different from 50 marks with a confidence level of 95%. Can you calculate the p-value using the Wilcoxon signed-rank test?
message_2: To calculate the p-value using the Wilcoxon signed-rank test, we need the actual marks of the 20 students. Please provide the data (marks of the 20 students) to proceed with the calculation.
